Title: Sight
Written by:
Andrew Hyatt 
 John Duigan 
 Buzz McLaughlin
Based on: From Darkness to Sight by Ming Wang
Produced by:
Darren Moorman 
 David Fischer 
 Vicki Sotheran
Starring:
Terry Chen 
 Greg Kinnear 
 Danni Wang 
 Raymond Ma 
 Bennet Wang 
 Jayden Zhang 
 Wai Ching Ho 
 Fionnula Flanagan
Production: Filming began in Vancouver in April 2021 and wrapped after a six-week shoot in October 2021.
Release: In April 2023, it was reported that Briarcliff Entertainment had acquired distribution rights for Sight and scheduled a release date for October 27, 2023.  In February 2024, Angel Studios acquired the rights and scheduled the film to be released on May 24, 2024.
